passives.name: Whirling Edge Extension
passives.desc:
When using Whirling Edge:
 • Slight boost to BRV increased based on MAX BRV
 • Grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt

When using BRV Attack+:
 • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Whirling Edge Extension: Boost to Whirling Edge

passives.name: Buff Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Sensual Dance Extension
passives.desc:
When using Sensual Dance:
 • Inflicted debuff duration +2
 • Slight boost to BRV granted to party based on MAX BRV

After using Sensual Dance:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (slightly restores HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of MAX HP) for 6 turns
passives.short_desc: Sensual Dance Extension: Boost to Sensual Dance

• ATK Down、 MAG ATK Down boost、 duration+
• All Targets: 4 turns Sap
• Party: 6 turns MAX BRV Up II; increased BRV gain

passive.short_desc: A Wing of the Goddess: May equip Rousing Samba & Dancer's Fury

passives.name: A Wing of the Goddess Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Terpsichore (XI) or passive ability A Wing of the Goddess:\n • Slightly raises MAX BRV、 moderately raises ATK
passives.short_desc: A Wing of the Goddess Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passive.name: A Wing of the Goddess Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Rousing Samba & Dancer's Fury
passive.short_desc: A Wing of the Goddess Extension: Boost to Rousing Samba & Dancer's Fury

passives.name: Dancer's Fury Advance
passives.desc: Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Dancer's Fury
passives.short_desc: Dancer's Fury Advance: Boost to Dancer's Fury

passives.name: A Wing of the Goddess Extension Attack Up++
passives.desc:
While equipping EX+ weapon Terpsichore (XI)+ or passive ability A Wing of the Goddess Extension:
 • Moderately raises ATK
 • BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage over BRV Attack+; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV)
 • HP Attack、 HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of own MAX HP; grants party BRV based on HP damage dealt)
passives.short_desc: A Wing of the Goddess Extension Attack Up: Raises ATK; enables BRV Attack++、 HP Attack++

passives.name: Rousing Samba Buff Starting
passives.desc: 6 turns Rousing Samba buff at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Rousing Samba Buff Starting: Rousing Samba buff at start of quest

passives.name: Dancer's Fury BRV Hit Plus Force Advance
passives.desc: When using Dancer's Fury:\n • BRV attack hit count becomes 7; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Dancer's Fury BRV Hit Plus Force Advance: Boost to Dancer's Fury
